definition: immediately adjacent/immediately following/to follow closely on
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: When the markets opened the following Monday, the Dow bid adieu to 10000 for good.
sentences.chinese: 股市在緊接着的週一開盤時就告別了10000點。

sentences.english: Then I have patted "the Day Yunshan Legend" with him.
sentences.chinese: 緊接着，我又跟他拍了《天雲山傳奇》。

sentences.english: It's the first thing they should teach you after arithmetic, in grade school.
sentences.chinese: 這是你在學校學完基本算術後的緊接着的課。

sentences.english: Then the second-place man sliced a fly into quarters.
sentences.chinese: 緊接着排名第二的人將一隻蒼蠅切成了四半。

sentences.english: The piece segues into his solo with the strings.
sentences.chinese: 曲終後緊接着就是他的絃樂獨奏。

sentences.english: The array brackets come after the argument name instead of after the type.
sentences.chinese: 數組括號緊接參數名之後，而非類型之後。
新年是緊接在聖誕節之後。

sentences.english: Maundy Thursday served as a preparation for the feast of Easter about to follow.
sentences.chinese: 濯足日乃是爲著緊接著到來之復活節筵席所做的預備。

sentences.english: This will be followed up by CR2 release in the beginning of August.
Then, introduces the four parts of the lawyer culture;
sentences.chinese: 緊接着，又介紹了律師文化的“四分法”。

sentences.english: Then a helper comes to immediately move the baby inside.
sentences.chinese: 緊接着就會有助手把孩子抱進教堂裏。

sentences.english: Developing cultivation and solicitation strategies will follow closely behind.
sentences.chinese: 開發培育及勸募的策略將緊接於後。

sentences.english: Alternatively, heat one side of a gas grill set on medium-high.
sentences.chinese: 緊接着，把烤架的一半邊加熱即可。

sentences.english: After taking a cold rawness of the larynx and trachea come on.
sentences.chinese: 感冒了，緊接是喉嚨和氣管的疼痛。

sentences.english: Sepal One of the structures situated immediately below the petals of a flower.
sentences.chinese: 一朵花中位置緊接在花瓣下方的結構。

sentences.english: Then, when she was in the sixth grade, the family bought its first computer.
sentences.chinese: 緊接着，她升上了六年級，家裏買了第一臺電腦。
